title: Continental Airlines
content:
Sorry if this is an obvious one, but I am a type newbie. I tried searching for this but had no luck. If you could ID this typeface for me, I'd appreciate it fully!

Thank You.

AB

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017033418im_/http:/typophile.com/files/logo_5029.JPG)
author: andy_ab11

comments.content: Thank you Raph. I appreciate it.
